TEI:
Patiṟṟuppattu 2.19. vaḷaṉaṟu paitiram Kumattūr Kaṇṇaṉār
Roland Ferenczi
tuṟai: pariciṟṟuṟaip pāṭāṇpāṭṭu, vaṇṇam: oḻukuvaṇṇamuñ coṟcīr vaṇṇamum, tūkku: centūkku.
koḷḷai valcik kavarkāṟ kūḷiyar
kalluṭai neṭuneṟi pōḻntucura ṉaṟuppa
voṇpoṟik kaḻaṟkāṉ māṟā vayavar
tiṇpiṇi yeḵkam puliyuṟai kaḻippac
ceṅkaḷa viruppoṭu kūla muṟṟiya
vuruvac centiṉai kurutiyoṭu tūuy
maṇṇuṟu muracaṅ kaṇpeyart tiyavar
kaṭippuṭai valattar toṭittō ḷōcca
vampukaḷai vaṟiyācac cuṟṟamō ṭamputerin
tavviṉai mēvalai yākali
ṉellu naṉiyirun tellip peṟṟa
varitupeṟu pāyaṟ ciṟumaki ḻāṉuṅ
kaṉaviṉu ḷuṟaiyum peruñcāl poṭuṅkiya
nāṇumali yākkai vāṇuta larivaik
kiyarko laḷiyai
yiṉantō ṭakala vūruṭa ṉeḻuntu
nilaṅkaṇ vāṭa nāñcil kaṭintunī
vāḻta līyā vaḷaṉaṟu paitira
maṉṉa vāyiṉa paḻaṉan tōṟum
maḻaṉmali tāmarai yāmpaloṭu malarntu
nelliṉ ceṟuvi ṉeytal pūppa
varinar koyvāṇ maṭaṅka vaṟainar
tīmpiḻi yentiram pattal varunta
viṉṟō vaṉṟō toṉṟōr kālai
nallama ṉaḷiya tāmeṉac collik
kāṇunar kaipuṭait tiraṅka
māṇā māṭciya māṇṭaṉa palavē
